lines.text: create map m1 from long long integer to long long integer
lines.code: map < long long int , long long int > m1 ;

lines.text: create map iterator itr from long long integer to long long integer
lines.code: map < long long int , long long int > :: iterator itr ;

lines.text: create long long integer vector vec with size 1000005
create long long integers x , y , a , b
lines.code: long long int x , y , a , b ;

lines.text: read x read y read a read b
create long long integer a1 with a1 = absolute value of ( x - a )
lines.code: long long int a1 = abs ( x - a ) ;

lines.text: create long long integer a2 with a2 = absolute value of ( y - b )
lines.code: long long int a2 = abs ( y - b ) ;

lines.text: create long long integer step with step = minimum of ( a1 and a2 )
lines.code: long long int step = min ( a1 , a2 ) ;

lines.text: create long long integer ans with ans = step
create long long integer maxy with maxy = maximum of a1 and a2
lines.code: long long int maxy = max ( a1 , a2 ) ;
